metadata.title: CVE-2024-5694 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker could have caused a use-after-free in the JavaScript engine toread memory in the JavaScript string section of the heap. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 127.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
